AND STD_HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #{map.search } || '%'
AND STD_EN_NM LIKE '%' || #{map.search } ||'%'
AND HAN_EXPL LIKE '%' || #{map.search } || '%'
AND DOMN_NM LIKE '%' || #{map.search } || '%'
AND (STD_HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #{map.search } || '%' OR STD_EN_NM LIKE '%' || #{map.search } ||'%' OR HAN_EXPL LIKE '%' || #{map.search } || '%' OR DOMN_NM LIKE '%' || #{map.search } || '%' )
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO STD_NM S USING DUAL ON ( S.STD_HAN_NM = #{stdhannm} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET S.STD_EN_NM = #{stdennm} , S.EN_ABBR_NM = #{enabbrnm} , S.HAN_EXPL = #{hanexpl} , S.DOMN_NM = #{domnnm} , S.FIN_MDFY_DT = SYSDATE , S.FIN_UPDR_ID = 'ADMIN' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (S.STD_HAN_NM, S.STD_EN_NM, S.EN_ABBR_NM, S.HAN_EXPL, S.DOMN_NM,S.VBG_CRE_USER_ID,S.FIN_UPDR_ID ) VALUES (#{stdhannm},#{stdennm},#{enabbrnm},#{hanexpl},#{domnnm},'ADMIN','ADMIN')
